scoringPlays.text: Marcus Childers 10 Yd Run (Christian Hagan Kick)
Shane Wimann 34 Yd pass from Marcus Childers (Christian Hagan Kick)
Emmanuel Reed 21 Yd pass from Drew Anderson (Adam Mitcheson Kick)

videos.description: Drew Anderson connects with Anthony Johnson for 21-yards, leading to a field goal.
videos.headline: Anderson connects with Johnson for 21-yard gain

videos.description: QB Marcus Childers calls his own number for a 10-yard touchdown run.
videos.headline: Childers keeps it and runs it in for the 10-yard TD

videos.description: Marcus Childers connects with a wide open Shane Wimann for a 34-yard TD strike.
videos.headline: Childers finds Wimann for a 34-yard TD

videos.description: Drew Anderson dumps pass off to Emmanuel Reed who bursts for 40-yards.
videos.headline: Reed takes short pass 40-yards up field

videos.description: Drew Anderson connects with Emmanuel Reed for the 21-yard touchdown.
videos.headline: Anderson finds a wide open Reed for the 21-yard TD

videos.description: Cameron Lewis delivers a big hit to force a  fumble, leading to a field goal.
videos.headline: Lewis delivers bruising hit to cause fumble

videos.description: Marcus Childers finds Chad Beebe for 27 yards.
videos.headline: Childers connects with Beebe on long gain

videos.description: Kyle Vantrease throws it up to Anthony Johnson for a 47-yard gain.
videos.headline: Johnson goes up and gets ball for big gain

videos.description: Kyle Vantrease throws it deep to Antonio Nunn for a 43-yard gain.
videos.headline: Vantrease lobs it up to Nunn for leaping grab

videos.description: Back up QB Kyle Vantrease's pass is intercepted by Jawuan Johnson.
videos.headline: Johnson comes up with critical interception

receiver.receiver_player_name: Anthony Johnson, broken up by Mykelti Williams
